description: Define designer layout model as a direct subset of CSS box model + flex/grid properties (no constraint solver concepts).
Implement mapping from designer node layout properties to DOM style props (inline styles or class tokens) for canvas rendering.
Implement container layout modes: flex column and flex row.
Implement container spacing controls: gap, padding, border (as exposed by the designer UI).
Implement alignment controls for flex containers: justify-content and align-items.
Implement item sizing controls: width/height and min/max constraints using CSS values.
Implement flex item controls: grow/shrink/basis for nodes inside flex containers (where meaningful).
Implement grid container mode using CSS grid (template columns/rows + gap + auto-flow).
Replace custom drop-parent resolution with @dnd-kit/core (sensors + collision detection + sortable).
Implement reorder within the same container using dnd-kit sortable primitives.
Implement moving nodes across containers (drop into another container) using dnd-kit over/collision results.
Implement nesting into eligible containers using an explicit type-based allowlist (containers vs leaves).
Provide drop indicators derived from DOM geometry (insertion index before/after, nested target highlight).
Implement a clear invalid-drop UX state (blocked cursor/indicator + no state mutation).
Implement aspect ratio for images using CSS aspect-ratio and object-fit (no JS math).
Implement resize handles for image + container blocks (section/stack) that update pixel CSS sizing props and rely on DOM layout (no constraint solver).
Implement property-panel editing of sizing props as CSS strings (%/rem/auto) while drag resize remains pixel-only.
Implement basic snapping as discrete insertion behavior: edge snapping (before/after) for flex and deterministic cell/index snapping for grid.
Ensure drag-drop persists only container + insertion index (no coordinate-based layout persistence).
Delete legacy geometry utilities: constraintSolver.ts, constraints.ts, dropParentResolution.ts, aspectRatio.ts.
Reduce utils/layout.ts to lightweight mapping helpers only, removing coordinate math and solver logic.
Update designer state serialization/export to persist CSS-like layout props as part of the workspace snapshot/AST export.
Ensure preview rendering uses the same CSS semantics as the invoice renderer (no designer-only geometry).
Audit and remove any runtime imports of deleted geometry modules from invoice-designer components.
Add developer-facing docs in SCRATCHPAD.md for key dnd-kit collision strategy choices and nesting rules.
